Name: Chikorita
Entry: A sweet aroma wafts from its leaf. It is said to calm battling Pokémon.

Name: Bayleef
Entry: Its spicy aroma acts as a stimulant to restore health.

Name: Meganium
Entry: Meganium's breath has the power to revive dead grass and plants.

Name: Cyndaquil
Entry: It flares flames from its back when it is angry or surprised.

Name: Quilava
Entry: Its fire burns with intensity as it prepares to battle.

Name: Typhlosion
Entry: It can hide behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates.

Name: Totodile
Entry: Its jaws are powerful and can crush anything.

Name: Croconaw
Entry: Once it bites down, it won't let go until it loses its fangs.

Name: Feraligatr
Entry: It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding speed when it attacks.

Name: Pidgey
Entry: A docile Pokémon that avoids fighting. It spreads its wings to scare foes.

Name: Pidgeotto
Entry: It flies over its territory and patrols it constantly.

Name: Pidgeot
Entry: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speeds.

Name: Spearow
Entry: It flaps its wings to maintain balance while flying.

Name: Fearow
Entry: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land.

Name: Hoothoot
Entry: It always stands on one foot, even when asleep.

Name: Noctowl
Entry: Its eyes are specially adapted to see clearly in the dark.

Name: Rattata
Entry: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

Name: Raticate
Entry: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard objects.

Name: Sentret
Entry: It stands on its tail so it can see a long way. If it spots an enemy, it cries loudly to warn its kind.

Name: Furret
Entry: It makes a nest to suit its long and skinny body. The nest is impossible for other Pokémon to enter.

Name: Pichu
Entry: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may discharge if startled or amused.

Name: Pikachu
Entry: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning.

Name: Raichu
Entry: If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail to gather electricity from the atmosphere.

Name: Caterpie
Entry: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.

Name: Metapod
Entry: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden its shell to protect itself.

Name: Butterfree
Entry: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.

Name: Weedle
Entry: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

Name: Kakuna
Entry: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.

Name: Beedrill
Entry: It flies at high speed and attacks using the large, venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

Name: Ledyba
Entry: It is timid and clusters together with others. The fluid secreted by its feet indicates its location.

Name: Ledian
Entry: The spots on its back grow larger or smaller depending on the number of stars in the night sky.

Name: Spinarak
Entry: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.

Name: Ariados
Entry: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It's hard to tell which end is which.

Name: Geodude
Entry: Commonly found near mountain trails and the like. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry.

Name: Graveler
Entry: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

Name: Golem
Entry: Its body can survive dynamite blasts without a single scratch. It sheds its hide once a year.

Name: Zubat
Entry: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. It uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

Name: Golbat
Entry: It attacks in a stealthy manner, without warning. Its sharp fangs are used to bite and suck blood.

Name: Crobat
Entry: With its two additional wings, Crobat can fly much faster than its previous evolutions.

Name: Cleffa
Entry: It is often seen when shooting stars fill the night skies. It's said to arrive riding on a shooting star.

Name: Clefairy
Entry: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

Name: Clefable
Entry: They are difficult to find because they move about at night. The ears can hear a pin drop from a kilometer away.

Name: Igglybuff
Entry: Its soft and pliable body is very bouncy. When it sings continuously with all its might, its body starts shaking.

Name: Jigglypuff
Entry: It captivates foes with its huge, round eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing a soothing melody.

Name: Wigglytuff
Entry: It has a soft, plump body that bounces delightfully. Its fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won't want to be separated.

Name: Togepi
Entry: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

Name: Togetic
Entry: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.

Name: Sandshrew
Entry: It burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

Name: Sandslash
Entry: It curls up in a ball to protect itself from enemy attacks. It also curls up to prevent heatstroke.

Name: Ekans
Entry: It sneaks through grass without making a sound and strikes unwary prey with its venomous fangs.

Name: Arbok
Entry: To intimidate foes, it spreads its chest wide and makes eerie patterns with its body.

Name: Dunsparce
Entry: It digs into the ground with its tail and makes a maze-like nest. It can float slightly using its wings.

Name: Mareep
Entry: Its fluffy wool stores electricity. It shocks foes with the static electricity in its fleece.

Name: Flaaffy
Entry: Its fleece grows even more when static electricity builds up. Touching it can cause shocks.

Name: Ampharos
Entry: The light from its tail can be seen from space. It is used to send signals to distant regions.

Name: Wooper
Entry: When it walks around on the ground, it coats its body with a slimy, poisonous film.

Name: Quagsire
Entry: It has a relaxed nature. It doesn’t care if it bumps its head on boats and boulders while swimming.

Name: Gastly
Entry: Born from gases, it can envelop an opponent in its toxic gas, causing them to faint.

Name: Haunter
Entry: It lurks in darkness and stares into the victim's soul. Its chilling touch causes endless shivering.

Name: Gengar
Entry: It hides in the shadows of people and Pokémon, waiting for a chance to strike.

Name: Unown
Entry: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a mystery whether it came first or the writing came first.

Name: Onix
Entry: It burrows through the ground at a speed of 80 km/h while feeding on large boulders.

Name: Steelix
Entry: It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years, its body slowly becomes harder than diamonds.

Name: Bellsprout
Entry: A carnivorous Pokémon that traps and eats bugs. It uses its roots as feet to walk around.

Name: Weepinbell
Entry: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hunger rarely allows it to think carefully.

Name: Victreebel
Entry: Lures prey with a sweet scent and swallows it whole. The inside of its body is filled with acids.

Name: Hoppip
Entry: It drifts on winds. If it senses the approach of strong winds, it links its leaves with others to stay grounded.

Name: Skiploom
Entry: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluctuates up and down.

Name: Jumpluff
Entry: It rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands.

Name: Paras
Entry: Mushrooms sprout from its back. They grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.

Name: Paras
Entry: Paras has parasitic mushrooms growing on its back called tochukaso. They grow by drawing nutrients from the host.

Name: Parasect
Entry: The bug is mostly dead, with the mushroom on its back having taken over its body.

Name: Poliwag
Entry: Its skin is so thin, its internal organs are visible. It has trouble walking on its newly grown legs.

Name: Poliwhirl
Entry: It can live in or out of the water. When out of the water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

Name: Poliwrath
Entry: Its brawny body is full of muscles. It can swim through the toughest currents in powerful bursts.

Name: Politoed
Entry: They gather on moonlit nights to sing in a chorus. The cries sound angry and yet joyous.

Name: Magikarp
Entry: It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic Pokémon.

Name: Gyarados
Entry: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

Name: Goldeen
Entry: It swims elegantly by flapping its tail fin as if it were a dress. It has the nickname of the 'Water Queen.'

Name: Seaking
Entry: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.

Name: Slowpoke
Entry: It is always so absent-minded that it won't react, even if its flavorful tail is bitten.

Name: Slowbro
Entry: An attached Shellder won't let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes from its tail.

Name: Slowking
Entry: When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke's head and unlocked an extraordinary power.

Name: Oddish
Entry: It wanders around at night, sowing its seeds in the moonlight. During the day, it stays still, hiding in the ground.

Name: Gloom
Entry: What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.

Name: Vileplume
Entry: Its petals are the largest in the world. As it walks, it scatters extremely allergenic pollen.

Name: Bellossom
Entry: Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.

Name: Drowzee
Entry: If your nose itches while you are sleeping, it's a sure sign that one of these Pokémon is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream through your nostrils.

Name: Hypno
Entry: It carries a pendulum-like device. There once was an incident in which it took away a child it hypnotized.

Name: Abra
Entry: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. It uses a variety of extrasensory powers even while asleep.

Name: Kadabra
Entry: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

Name: Alakazam
Entry: Its brain cells multiply continually until it dies. As a result, it remembers everything.

Name: Ditto
Entry: It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular structure to transform into whatever it sees.

Name: Pineco
Entry: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn’t bother it.

Name: Forretress
Entry: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside the armor is a total mystery.

Name: Nidoran♀
Entry: Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

Name: Nidorina
Entry: When it is with its friends or family, its barbs are tucked away to prevent injury.

Name: Nidoqueen
Entry: Its body is covered with hard scales. It will protect the young in its burrow with its life.

Name: Nidoran♂
Entry: The male Nidoran has developed muscles that freely move its ears in any direction.

Name: Nidorino
Entry: Its horn is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once.

Name: Treecko
Entry: Treecko is cool, calm, and collected—it never panics under any situation.

Name: Grovyle
Entry: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping prowess.

Name: Sceptile
Entry: It agilely leaps about the jungle and attacks with its sharp leaf-covered tail.

Name: Torchic
Entry: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.

Name: Combusken
Entry: It lashes out with 10 kicks per second. Its quick fighting style overwhelms foes.

Name: Blaziken
Entry: Blaziken’s legs possess strength and speed to jump over skyscrapers.

Name: Mudkip
Entry: To alert it to danger, Mudkip’s fin senses the flow of water.

Name: Marshtomp
Entry: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing even in mud. It burrows into muddy ground to sleep.

Name: Swampert
Entry: It can swim as fast as a jet ski. It also has strength to move boulders that weigh more than a ton.

Name: Poochyena
Entry: It savagely threatens foes with bared fangs. It chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted.

Name: Mightyena
Entry: It chases down prey in a pack of around ten. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.

Name: Zigzagoon
Entry: Zigzagoon constantly explores. It relentlessly zigzags in search of food and items.

Name: Linoone
Entry: It runs in a straight line at top speed. If it finds an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it.

Name: Wurmple
Entry: It spits silk to entangle foes. It does so as a defense to escape.

Name: Silcoon
Entry: Silcoon tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. It awaits evolution.

Name: Beautifly
Entry: Beautifly’s favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If it’s attacked, it flaps its wings to repel foes.

Name: Cascoon
Entry: Cascoon remains motionless, awaiting evolution. It stores energy by lying still.

Name: Dustox
Entry: It scatters its fine, toxic dust when it flies. It is nocturnal and is attracted to light.

Name: Lotad
Entry: Lotad is very helpful. It carries small Pokémon across ponds by ferrying them on its broad leaf.

Name: Lombre
Entry: It is mischievous and likes to pull pranks on people. It can appear out of rivers and scare unwary people.

Name: Ludicolo
Entry: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo's cells, making it more powerful.

Name: Seedot
Entry: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. It sucks moisture from the tree.

Name: Nuzleaf
Entry: Nuzleaf live in densely overgrown forests. They occasionally appear in towns and scare people.

Name: Shiftry
Entry: Shiftry is a mysterious Pokémon that is said to live atop towering trees dating back over a thousand years.

Name: Taillow
Entry: It dislikes cold seasons. It migrates to other lands in search of warmth, flying over 180 miles a day.

Name: Swellow
Entry: Swellow flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky.

Name: Wingull
Entry: It rides the winds and flies over the sea. It folds its wings to rest when it reaches the shore.

Name: Pelipper
Entry: It skims the top of waves as it flies. It carries small Pokémon in its beak and hoards them as food.

Name: Ralts
Entry: Ralts senses the emotions of people using the horns on its head. It rarely appears before people.

Name: Kirlia
Entry: If Kirlia's Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.

Name: Gardevoir
Entry: Gardevoir has the power to predict the future. It will protect its Trainer at any cost.

Name: Surskit
Entry: It moves as if skating on the surface of water. It often feeds on aquatic microorganisms.

Name: Masquerain
Entry: It intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns on its wings. When it rains, it retreats to a safe place.

Name: Shroomish
Entry: Shroomish lives in damp soil in the dark depths of forests. It feeds on compost made of fallen leaves.

Name: Breloom
Entry: Breloom’s fighting technique puts boxers to shame. It throws punches that are faster than the eye can see.

Name: Slakoth
Entry: Slakoth moves only when necessary and even then at a slow pace. It sleeps for 20 hours a day.

Name: Vigoroth
Entry: Its heart beats at a tenfold tempo, so it cannot sit still for even a moment.

Name: Slaking
Entry: Slaking spends most of its days lying down and lolling about. It only moves when it needs to eat.

Name: Nincada
Entry: Nincada lives underground for many years in darkness. It uses its sharp claws to carve through roots.

Name: Ninjask
Entry: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It cries loudly to make itself known.

Name: Shedinja
Entry: A peculiar Pokémon that floats in air even though its wings remain completely still.

Name: Whismur
Entry: It cries loudly enough to be heard over 1,500 feet away. It does so to intimidate foes.

Name: Loudred
Entry: Loudred's bellowing can completely decimate the ground and shatter windows.

Name: Exploud
Entry: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It uses its booming voice to communicate.

Name: Makuhita
Entry: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees repeatedly. It grows stronger with every hit.

Name: Hariyama
Entry: Hariyama is known for its strength. It can send a truck flying with a single palm thrust.

Name: Azurill
Entry: Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It plays by bouncing its tail around.

Name: Nosepass
Entry: Nosepass always faces north. Its magnetism is stronger in cold weather.

Name: Skitty
Entry: It shows its cute side by chasing its own tail until it gets dizzy.

Name: Delcatty
Entry: Delcatty prefers to live an unfettered existence. It does what it pleases at its own pace.

Name: Sableye
Entry: Sableye digs the ground with its sharp claws to find rocks that it eats. It feeds on gem stones.

Name: Mawile
Entry: Mawile’s huge jaws are actually steel horns that it uses to crush foes.

Name: Aron
Entry: It eats iron to build its steel body. It is said to feed on railroad tracks and ships.

Name: Lairon
Entry: It loves eating iron ore and special rocks. It uses its sturdy body to bash its enemies.

Name: Aggron
Entry: Aggron claims an entire mountain as its territory. It mercilessly beats up intruders.

Name: Meditite
Entry: It continually meditates for hours every day. It eats just one berry a day as training.

Name: Medicham
Entry: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe’s next move.

Name: Electrike
Entry: Electrike stores electricity in its fur. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.

Name: Manectric
Entry: Manectric discharges strong electricity from its mane. It creates thunderstorms when it charges.

Name: Plusle
Entry: It cheers on its partners by shorting out its electricity with sparks. It creates a positive atmosphere.

Name: Minun
Entry: Minun cheers on friends by using its sparks to create a shower of bright flashes.

Name: Volbeat
Entry: It communicates with others by lighting up its tail. It loves the sweet aroma of Illumise.

Name: Illumise
Entry: It guides Volbeat to draw patterns in the night sky. It’s said to earn the trust of Volbeat.

Name: Roselia
Entry: Roselia shoots sharp thorns as projectiles at anyone that tries to steal its flowers.

Name: Gulpin
Entry: It has a small heart and brain. Its stomach is said to be a bottomless pit.

Name: Swalot
Entry: It can swallow something as large as itself in one gulp. Its stomach acid can dissolve anything.

Name: Carvanha
Entry: They swarm any intruder and tear at it with their fangs. Their sharp teeth can tear through iron.

Name: Sharpedo
Entry: Sharpedo can swim at speeds of 75 mph by jetting seawater from its backside.

Name: Wailmer
Entry: Wailmer loves to startle people by forcefully expelling water from its nostrils.

Name: Wailord
Entry: Wailord is the largest Pokémon in the world. It can dive to depths of almost 10,000 feet.

Name: Numel
Entry: Numel stores magma in its hump. It is too dull to notice when it has been hit.

Name: Camerupt
Entry: Camerupt has volcanoes on its back. It erupts magma every 10 years.

Name: Slugma
Entry: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn’t keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

Name: Magcargo
Entry: Its body temperature is over 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit. Water is vaporized on contact.

Name: Torkoal
Entry: Torkoal burns coal to produce energy. Large amounts of smoke come out of its shell.

Name: Grimer
Entry: Grimer's sludgy body is made up of living toxic waste. It smells foul and sticks to everything.

Name: Muk
Entry: Muk's body is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison. It’s best to avoid it completely.

Name: Spoink
Entry: Spoink bounces around on its tail. The bouncing keeps its heart beating.

Name: Grumpig
Entry: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its psychic power.

Name: Spinda
Entry: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its movements are erratic.

Name: Trapinch
Entry: Trapinch's nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit dug in sand. This Pokémon patiently waits for prey to tumble down the pit.

Name: Vibrava
Entry: To make prey faint, Vibrava generates ultrasonic waves by vigorously flapping its wings.

Name: Flygon
Entry: Flygon is nicknamed 'the elemental spirit of the desert.' Because its flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand.

Name: Cacnea
Entry: Cacnea lives in arid locations. Its body is covered with thorns that grow to protect it.

Name: Cacturne
Entry: If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night, Cacturne will follow in a ragtag group.

Name: Swablu
Entry: Swablu has light and fluffy wings that are like cottony clouds. It cleans things with its wings.

Name: Altaria
Entry: Altaria sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton clouds, giving it a majestic appearance.

Name: Zangoose
Entry: Zangoose usually walks on all fours, but it stands on its hind legs when angry.

Name: Seviper
Entry: Seviper shares a long-running feud with Zangoose. Its sword-like tail serves as a formidable weapon.

Name: Lunatone
Entry: Lunatone becomes active on the night of a full moon. It hovers in the air and moves silently.

Name: Solrock
Entry: Solrock is a new species of Pokémon that is said to have fallen from space. It floats in air and moves silently.

Name: Barboach
Entry: Barboach’s whiskers serve as a superb radar system. It uses them to locate food and sense danger.

Name: Whiscash
Entry: Whiscash is extremely territorial. Just one of these Pokémon will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory.

Name: Corphish
Entry: Corphish is very hardy. It can survive in polluted water and adapt to any environment.

Name: Crawdaunt
Entry: Crawdaunt is extremely strong, but it has a rough and often violent temperament.

Name: Baltoy
Entry: Baltoy moves while spinning like a top. It has been said that ancient people created this Pokémon.

Name: Claydol
Entry: Claydol is an ancient Pokémon. It was born from clay dolls made by primitive humans.

Name: Lileep
Entry: Lileep became extinct approximately 100 million years ago. It uses its tentacles to capture prey.

Name: Cradily
Entry: Cradily lives in warm seas. It uses its tentacles to drag unsuspecting prey into its body.

Name: Anorith
Entry: Anorith is considered a primitive Pokémon. It has been resurrected from a fossil.

Name: Armaldo
Entry: Armaldo's tough armor protects it from all attacks. It lives near water and catches prey using its powerful claws.

Name: Feebas
Entry: Feebas is the shabbiest Pokémon. It is slow and ugly, but it is a hardy creature that can survive in any body of water.

Name: Milotic
Entry: Milotic is said to be the most beautiful Pokémon. It calms emotions and brings serenity with its appearance.

Name: Castform
Entry: Castform changes its form depending on the weather. It uses the power of nature to adapt its body.

Name: Kecleon
Entry: Kecleon can change the color of its body to match its surroundings. It uses this ability to camouflage itself.

Name: Shuppet
Entry: Shuppet feeds on dark emotions, such as grudges and envy. It appears in swarms on dark nights.

Name: Banette
Entry: Banette generates energy from hatred. It is said to curse anyone who carelessly throws it away.

Name: Duskull
Entry: Duskull wanders lost in the darkness. It is said to take away bad children who disobey their parents.

Name: Dusclops
Entry: Dusclops's body is completely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it swallows everything in darkness.

Name: Tropius
Entry: The bunch of fruit around Tropius's neck grows twice a year. Its sweet aroma lures other Pokémon.

Name: Chimecho
Entry: Chimecho makes beautiful sounds when it floats on the wind. It uses its voice to communicate emotion.

Name: Absol
Entry: Absol appears before natural disasters occur. Its appearance led people to believe it brings misfortune.

Name: Wynaut
Entry: Wynaut grows stronger by pushing up against others. It loves to play and bounce around.

Name: Snorunt
Entry: Snorunt lives in regions with heavy snowfall. It survives by eating snow and ice.

Name: Glalie
Entry: Glalie can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere, forming an icy body that is harder than steel.

Name: Spheal
Entry: Spheal rolls across ice to move. It bounces playfully and claps its flippers in delight.

Name: Sealeo
Entry: Sealeo likes to balance things on the tip of its nose. It plays with its food before eating it.

Name: Walrein
Entry: Walrein’s thick blubber protects it from cold temperatures. It can shatter icebergs with its tusks.

Name: Clamperl
Entry: Clamperl’s pearls are exceedingly rare and highly valued. The pearls grow with the Pokémon.

Name: Huntail
Entry: Huntail lives deep in the sea. It is said to hunt prey by luring it in with its tail, which looks like a small fish.

Name: Gorebyss
Entry: Gorebyss lives deep in the sea. Its pink body becomes more vivid the deeper it lives.

Name: Relicanth
Entry: Relicanth is a Pokémon species that has remained unchanged for 100 million years.

Name: Luvdisc
Entry: Luvdisc lives in warm seas. It is often seen swimming in couples, which has made it a symbol of love.

Name: Bagon
Entry: Bagon harbors a dream of one day soaring in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly, it hurls itself off cliffs.

Name: Shelgon
Entry: Shelgon's body is wrapped in a sturdy shell. The shell is so heavy that it slows the Pokémon's movements.

Name: Salamence
Entry: Salamence came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said to be uncontrollable in battle.

Name: Beldum
Entry: Beldum’s body emits a magnetic force. By linking together, they can form a strong magnetic chain.

Name: Metang
Entry: Metang is formed when two Beldum join together. It flies at high speeds, hunting for prey with its claws.

Name: Metagross
Entry: Metagross is the result of two Metang fusing together. Its four brains give it unparalleled intelligence.

Name: Regirock
Entry: Regirock's body is composed entirely of rocks. If any part of its body is chipped, it attaches rocks to repair itself.

Name: Regice
Entry: Regice’s body is made of Antarctic ice. It can survive in temperatures as low as -328 degrees Fahrenheit.

Name: Registeel
Entry: Registeel’s body is made of a strange material that is stronger than any known metal. It stretches and shrinks flexibly.

Name: Latias
Entry: Latias is highly intelligent and can understand human speech. It can become invisible when it senses danger.

Name: Latios
Entry: Latios has the ability to make others see an image of what it has seen or is imagining in its head.

Name: Kyogre
Entry: Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself. It has the power to summon massive rainstorms.
